text: Despite growing up with the Genesis version more, I'll admit this one sounds pretty good. In fact, there are a handful of tunes from the Sega Saturn version that I enjoy. This being one of them.

text: This is off topic but I wonder if there is a term for this type of imagery/art. I have a collection of each individual pokemon that looks like this. Basically the outline but main body and facial features are missing.
author: Ragnarokender

text: Great song, but I prefer Act 2 over this. Epicness is awesome in that part.
author: Subzwari1987

text: Overall, I prefer the Genesis soundtrack over this one, but the Saturn version still has some pretty nice tracks (this included)
author: Ned Zeppelin

text: It seems like Sonic hasn't fully loaded yet! The Saturn version of Sonic 3D Blast had a great quality soundtrack, with this and Rusty Ruins being my highlights. Rusty Ruins Act 2 (VGM 376) might even be my favorite theme in the whole Sonic franchise with its awesome progression. As for this track, the techno's interesting but the piano is what sold me.
author: SupraDarky
